dict.string: Today is six days of the Omer.
Hoy es seis días del Omer.
Aujourd'hui est six jours du Omer

For love to be eternal it requires bonding; a sense of togetherness which actualizes the love with a joint effort. Eternal love requires an intimate connection, kinship and attachment, one that benefits both parties. This bonding bears fruit; the fruit borne out of a healthy union.
The Nature of Real Romantic Relationships

Can you have a relationship without commitment? Is a real relationship possible when one or both people avoid being vulnerable? And how do you define love? Is it a noun or a verb? A state of being or an act? Join best-selling author and counselor Rabbi Simon Jacobson for a short, frank discussion about the nature of love and intimacy. Empower yourself to find and maintain the loving relationship that you've always wanted.
Start building something constructive together with a loved one.
